.brand-banner{width:100%;height:400px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-align:center;color:#fff;position:relative}.brand-image{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover}.brand-banner-text{position:absolute;width:100%;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);text-align:center;color:#fff;z-index:1;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:end}.line-bar{width:70px;margin:30px auto;height:2px;background-color:#353535}.brand-banner-text span:first-child{font-size:40px}.brand-banner-text span:nth-child(3){font-size:24px;padding-bottom:10px}.brand-menu{display:flex;justify-content:center;margin:20px 0}.menu-btn{padding:10px img{width:100%;border-radius:10px}.map{margin-top:40px;text-align:center}.container{max-width:1200px;margin:20px auto;padding:20px;background:#fff;border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 4px 6px ease}.thumbnail.active,.thumbnail:hover{transform:scale(1.1)}.product-info-section{flex:1;max-width:500px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:20px}.product-quantity{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;width:100%}.product-quantity label{font-size:14px}.product-quantity input{width:60px;height:30px;font-size:14px;text-align:center;border:1px solid 20px;font-size:16px;font-weight:700;text-align:center;border:none;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;transition:background-color .3s ease}.product-col{display:flex;width:100%;align-items:center}.product-col span{font-size:16px;color:#353535}.product-col span:first-child{min-width:120px}.product-col:nth-child(2) span{color:#008bcc;font-size:12px;font-weight:700}.line-bar-product{width:100%;height:1px;background-color:#353535}.min-total{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:20px}.min-total img{width:32px;height:32px;justify-content:center}.generate,.upload-ui img{display:flex;width:150px;height:auto}.generate-btn:hover{background-color:#333}.result-image{background-color:hsla(0,0%,81.6%,.611764705882353);border-radius:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;width:270px;height:auto;min-height:300px}#generated-image{object-fit:contain;border-radius:20px}.product-scroll{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.scroll-menu{margin:100px h3{margin-bottom:10px;font-weight:700}.info-column p,.info-column ul{line-height:1.6;margin:5px 0}.info-column
